addressWarning.title: Warning
addressWarning.description: Transfers to exchanges that do not support internal transactions may result in lost funds. If the recipient is not an exchange address, then you can ignore this warning

banner.description: Once approved it will trigger the payment process and can’t be edited.

error.title: An error occurred
error.description: We were unable to generate the invoice, please try again later

mandate.title: Accept invoicing mandate

summary.question: Why should I accept an invoicing order mandate?
summary.answer_1: Accepting an invoicing order mandate means that you give us the authorization to generate an invoice on your behalf, in compliance with all legal and regulatory requirements needed.
summary.answer_2: Our system makes sure that all your information is correct, up to date and according to the recommended norms.
summary.answer_3: We take care of calculating the VAT and the total amount to invoice with updated token exchange rates, ensuring that all invoices reflect the most accurate and compliant financial data.
summary.answer_4: This is necessary when you file for a tax return, including VAT if applicable.

mandate.terms: I have read and accept the _invoicing mandate_ for my rewards

toaster.error: We were unable to process the mandate acceptation, please try again later

summary.requirement: Informations required on your invoice for acceptance:
summary.rule_2: Your legal information (Name, address, country, VAT Number if in UE)
summary.rule_3: The invoice must be issued to WAGMI , 60 rue François 1er 75008 Paris, France, VAT Number : FR 26 908233638
summary.rule_4: Reward date, Reward ID number, name of the project for each reward
summary.rule_5: Your invoice should be issued in $ with the following mention: “[number] [type of tokens] received and accepted as payment for this invoice.”

uploadInvoice.sample_to_download: We highly recommend downloading our invoice sample to help you create your own correctly.
uploadInvoice.sample_link_label: Click here to download and get started
uploadInvoice.errorMaxSizeFile: The file is too large, please upload a file smaller than 3MB
uploadInvoice.fileType: Only PDF files smaller than 3MB are accepted
